stitch right side rs count over 3 stitches on left needle and down 3 ridge bumps including ridge bump directly on left needle and insert right needle into the stitch directly below 3rd ridge bump 5 stitches down yo and draw the yarn loop and place on your right needle k1 insert right needle back into the same stitch you drew previous yarn loop through yo and draw another yarn loop back on to your right needle k1 repeat 4 more times until you have 6 yarn loops on your right needle with one knit stitch between yarn loops continue knitting the row according to pattern wrong side ws knit until 1 stitch before the first yo in shell purl this stitch and the first yo together through the back loop purl next stitch and next yo together through the back loop repeat one more time 3
